aboutText: Hi, <bold>Steal the Word</bold> is a free software licensed under the MIT. This browser extension is currently in beta version, and there are some known issues that I have yet to fix, but I hope it works well in most use cases. Feel free to report bugs/issues or give me some advices through Chrome Web Store support or by opening an issue/ pull request on github, you can get more info in the README of this github repo page.
